statements: DELETE FROM portfolios WHERE client_id = 100 AND client_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM portfolios WHERE portfolio_value > 10000 OR client_name LIKE 'A%';
DELETE FROM Clients WHERE client_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 100 AND client_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Portfolios WHERE portfolio_value > 100000 AND client_id IN (SELECT client_id FROM Clients WHERE client_phone LIKE '%555%');
DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE client_id = 2001 AND transaction_type = 'BUY';
DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 10000 AND transaction_type = 'Buy';
DELETE FROM Portfolio WHERE client_id = 201 AND total_value < 5000;
